name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James E. HAMMONDS, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James E. HAMMONDS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John J. Dean, Anthony J. Lalama, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Charles W. Johns, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
356 A.2d 360
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James E. HAMMONDS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 12, 1976.
John J. Dean, Anthony J. Lalama, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Charles W. Johns, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
